summary: Add 9 Bound Shield Spells. You can find the spellbooks inside a strongbox at Breezehome, Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This mod add 9 new bound shield spells. You can find the spellbooks inside a strongbox at Breezehome, Whiterun. Spells only equipable by left hand.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/90995/90995-1524992454-645146775.jpeg[/img]

The shields only have 1 armor rating, but provide different effects when blocking and bashing. For example Burning Ward will negate any damage from spells with fire damage keyword when blocking, and will generate short range firebolt if used to bash. Wheel of Desolation will absorb life from nearby living enemy when blocking, it's bash attack deal magical damage and will kill any target with health less than 20%.


Please report any bug form this mod.

Steamwork link : https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1362890947


Credit:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68773]Bound Shield with FX[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/143693]warreko[/url]﻿ for bound shield script.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64283]Immersive Jewelry[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/758255]Forteverum[/url]﻿ for several gem and ingot models.
author: Raka Dewa
